original_text: He will help you to feel young again. He will take care of you when you are old. Your son's wife, Ruth, has given birth to this boy. She loves you and she has helped you more than seven sons could ever do.’
korean_text: 이는 네 생명의 회복자이며 네 노년의 봉양자라 곧 너를 사랑하며 일곱 아들보다 귀한 네 며느리가 낳은 자로다 하니라

sentences.original_text: He will help you to feel young again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신이 다시 젊게 느끼게 도와줄 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He will take care of you
has given birth to this boy.
more than seven sons could ever do.
sentences.korean_translation: 일곱 아들이 할 수 있는 것보다 더 많이.
